Title: Serenity MVC / TypeScript App Platform - BuiltWithDot.Net
Description:
Serenity is a ASP.NET MVC / TypeScript application platform which has been built on open source technologies. It aims to make development easier while reducing maintenance costs by avoiding boiler-plate code, reducing the time spent on repetitive tasks and applying best software design practices.
